name: HKError
desc: An error returned from a HealthKit method.

items.name: init(Code, userInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a HealthKit error from a code and user info dictionary.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: The domain for all HealthKit errors.

items.name: var errorCode: Int
items.desc: A code that represents the error.

items.name: var code: Code
items.desc: A code that represents the error.

items.name: var errorUserInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary that contains additional information about the error.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary that contains additional information about the error.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized description of the error.

items.name: enum HKError.Code
items.desc: Error codes returned by HealthKit.

items.name: static var noError: HKError.Code
items.desc: No error occurred.

items.name: static var errorHealthDataUnavailable: HKError.Code
items.desc: The user accessed HealthKit on an unsupported device.

items.name: static var errorHealthDataRestricted: HKError.Code
items.desc: A Mobile Device Management (MDM) profile restricts the use of HealthKit on this device.

items.name: static var errorInvalidArgument: HKError.Code
items.desc: The app passed an invalid argument to the HealthKit API.

items.name: static var errorAuthorizationDenied: HKError.Code
items.desc: The user hasn’t given the app permission to save data.

items.name: static var errorAuthorizationNotDetermined: HKError.Code
items.desc: The app hasn’t yet asked the user for the authorization required to complete the task.

items.name: static var errorRequiredAuthorizationDenied: HKError.Code
items.desc: The user hasn’t granted the application authorization to access all the required clinical record types.

items.name: static var errorDatabaseInaccessible: HKError.Code
items.desc: The HealthKit data is unavailable because it’s protected and the device is locked.

items.name: static var errorUserCanceled: HKError.Code
items.desc: The user canceled the operation.

items.name: static var errorAnotherWorkoutSessionStarted: HKError.Code
items.desc: Another app started a workout session.

items.name: static var errorUserExitedWorkoutSession: HKError.Code
items.desc: The user exited your application while a workout session was running.

items.name: static var errorNoData: HKError.Code
items.desc: Data is unavailable for the requested query and predicate.

items.name: static func == (HKError, HKError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two errors are the same.

items.name: static func != (HKError, HKError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values aren’t equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of a value by feeding them to the given hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.
